description: The Matcha Gin Fizz is a cocktail low on calories but refreshing and with an earthy finish. You can enjoy it as a long drink on a lazy or sunny afternoon or as a pre-dinner drink.
keywords: How To Make Matcha Gin Fizz
name: Matcha Gin Fizz

recipeInstructions.name: Fill your cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill your cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the gin, lemon juice, syrup, and matcha tea over the ice and shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the gin, lemon juice, syrup, and matcha tea over the ice and shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a highball filled halfway with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a highball filled halfway with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top up with the club soda.
recipeInstructions.text: Top up with the club soda.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve with a straw.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve with a straw.
